string-array.name: storyContents
string-array.item: The day started with us eating some magic mushrooms! We then went for our hike! we got lost and there was even some arguing. After falling off of our trail,eating snacks, and getting tired. We finally found the waterfall!
The best days are days with you. When we are together the days seemed endless and perfect. I get lost in your eyes the way i get lost in the ocean.
The first time I saw your suzie Wong coat, I knew you were the one for me. I watched you from across the street and got to know you.
